# core-badge

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                                                            | Type                          | Default   |
| ----------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------------------------- | --------- |
| `color`     | `color`     | Color of the badge. Defaults to `red`. Use: `color="black"` or `color="red"`. Default size is `"red"`. | `"black" \| "red"`            | `"red"`   |
| `size`      | `size`      | The pre-defined badge size. Use: `"small"` or `"large"`. Default size is `"large"`.                    | `"large" \| "small"`          | `"large"` |
| `variation` | `variation` | The badge variation. Use: `"border"`, `"dot"`, or `"fill"`. Default variation is `"fill"`.             | `"border" \| "dot" \| "fill"` | `"fill"`  |
